headline: PepsiCo Trades Below 200-Day SMA: Buying Opportunity or Red Flag?
summary: PEP struggles with a weak QFNA segment and North American market but may grow through effective cost management, global reach, strategic execution and industry strength.

headline: Hatching new ideas – Big Food’s incubator and accelerator programmes
summary: Our guide to some of the main incubators and accelerators operated by major food manufacturers as they look to tap into some of the consumer trends shaping demand.

headline: Like Dividend Stocks? The Payments for These 3 Dividend Kings Have Almost Never Been Better Than Right Now.
summary: All three of these dividend stocks have paid a quarterly dividend and increased it annually for over 50 years without fail.  This puts all three of these companies on the list of Dividend Kings.  The dividend yield is an important metric.
